text: Ivan Zvezdev () (born 12 August 1975) is one of the top TV Bulgarian cuisine showmen. Born in Sofia, he has one older brother Alex and a sister Boriana as well. With the help of bTV, his cuisine show Bon Apeti is well known in Bulgaria. From the middle of 2006 it is also part of the television GTV. He is married for Juliana, has two kids, a boy named Dimitar (or Mitko for short) and a girl Daniela (Dani) ==References== Category:Bulgarian television personalities Category:Living people Category:1975 births
title: Ivan Zvezdev
